This website hosts manuals and resources related to [training sessions held at the UQ Library](https://web.library.uq.edu.au/study-and-learning-support/training-and-workshops/online-and-person-workshops#keyword=;campus=;weekstart=).

Navigate the left sidebar to find the relevant session, or use the top-right field to search for a topic.

Further resources might be listed [on the Library website](https://web.library.uq.edu.au/study-and-learning-support/training-and-workshops/software-training-resources).

## Contributing

Contributions and suggestions are appreciated. Please refer to our [README.md](https://github.com/uqlibrary/technology-training/?tab=readme-ov-file#contributing) for details.
